blog.title: Clouds of Ink
blog.description: 28 | 18+ Blog | Mobile Master List | Buy Me a Ko-Fi | Freaky Fridays

summary: Please,, at your earliest convenience,,, write some happy Tony,,, whether it’s at the expense of y/n’s as a dark fic, I don’t...
question: Please,, at your earliest convenience,,, write some happy Tony,,, whether it’s at the expense of y/n’s as a dark fic, I don’t Mind ,,, I just want to see him happy - he deserves that much 😭 (your most recent young!tony made me cRY a real tear, I luv u + thank you for all that you do
answer:
a/n: lol okay this is stupid and silly and not angsty

“So..” Sam wiggles his eyebrows as he stares down at Tony’s upturned face. “What’s it feel like?”

Tony exhales deeply, his stomach turning with each twist of his body. The pillow on his lap doing nothing to alleviate the ungodly pressure in his crotch.

“Like I’m literally being torn in half and I’m this close to fucking the nearest hole,” he snaps.

Sam’s eyes widen and he steps backwards. Banner checks Tony’s temperature again and frowns.

“You’re in the thick of it,” he notes without the least bit of sympathy.

“Oh,” Tony groans. “I can fucking tell.”

Behind a closed door, he hears your muffled whine. His body jerks – calling to you, desperate for you.

“Jesus,” he says. “Is she in there alone?”

“Nah,” Sam tells him. “She’s got Bucky, Steve and Nat.”

“That’s so much worse,” he groans as he presses the flat of his palm to his forehead.

He had been in the lab with you and he had unknowingly released some sort of pheromone gas that made you crave the other infected person. It was essentially a “lust potion”.

You really couldn’t make this shit up.

Steve had taken matters into his own hands and quickly separated the two of you. Tony had thought it better to just fuck it out and you had seemed on board until Steve had bodily wrapped his arms around your waist and carried you to a sealed off location.

Bastard.

Tony hears a commotion and before he can blink, a body crashes straight into his. You’re straddling his waist, your hair in his eyes.  The smell of you touches something deep inside him, curls like a tight fist and tears its way through his chest. It is perfect.

You lean forward and kiss him with wet lips. It’s spit slick and messy and he crushes your skull to his own as they ferociously go at it in front of the whole team.

He can hear Steve swear profusely in the corner before trying to yank you off him. 

“Fuck off, Rogers,” you grunt as you kick his shin. “I want him. I want, Tony.”

“You’re poisoned!”

“No,” you practically scream. “No. No. I want him.”

Tony could give two shits. He makes grabby hands at you and you effectively stomp on Steve’s foot so, that you can run to his lap again.

Natasha is filming everything on her phone.

“Give it a break, Steve,” she calls to him. “Let them be.”

He whirls around on her. “How can you be okay with this? Neither of them can properly consent!”

“Speak for yourself, Capsicle,” Tony grumbles as he licks patterns into the hollow of your throat.

“What he said,” you reply, fisting your hand into his hair to press him closer.

“Steve,” Nat grins. “They’ve been secretly hooking up for a year. This isn’t a new thing.”

Steve’s eyebrows hit the top of his head. He looks like a drunk fish.

“What?”

“Oh yeah,” Tony says in between kissing you. “Both of us signed contracts when we got together. There was probably something in there about issues surrounding sex pollen pheromones.”

Your head falls backwards and your bruised lips part. “Don’t worry, Steve. We were literally mid fuck when he pierced the gas canister – “

“Yep,” Tony agrees. “I had my head between – “

“You know what?” Steve pinches the bridge of his nose. “I don’t even want to know.”

blog.name: themskteam

blog.description: We Fixed It. ALL of it

summary:
More concept art! 
Little late but I wanted to draw some of the canon bois that will be appearing, with some important...
body:
More concept art!

Little late but I wanted to draw some of the canon bois that will be appearing, with some important details

And thor with the long hair so I meet my quota and never have to draw him again. I’m sorry thor stans but it’s my hair from being 9 years old!! SO THAT’S ALL I SEE!!!

blog.name: quillium
blog.title: Randomness Embodied
blog.description: I don't know why you're here but welcome

summary: Yeah, Team Red is awesome but what about a three person team with Iron Man, a teenage Scarlet Witch, and MCU Ant Man??? There is...
body:
Yeah, Team Red is awesome but what about a three person team with Iron Man, a teenage Scarlet Witch, and MCU Ant Man??? There is literally so much potential. Iron Man brings the snark. Scarlet Witch has an amazing character arc where she slowly gets closer to Tony and has difficulty getting past Tony’s past as a weapon seller but slowly forgives him and realizes that she shouldn’t hold a grudge against Iron Man even if he was a bad dude in the past. There’s reconciliation and fluff there. Ant Man is a DAD and being on a team with a teenage Scarlet Witch who’s sorting out her issues??? Scott high key being amazed by Tony before he gets over the hero worship and then he switches between dad-ing and being Tired with Tony. Scott and Tony just sort of standing to the side while Wanda decimates a HYDRA base like “gosh I’m tired. I’m old. I’ve been doing this for so long. She’s powerful. Can’t she and Spider-man just take care of everything? Can I retire yet?” and also like “great job keep up the good work” *awkwardly gives Wanda a thumbs up, being fully aware their suits are awesome and not doing anything*. A running gag of Wanda doing weird things and pretending not to know they’re weird because of her time with HYDRA. 

More later.

blog.name: kaytewren
blog.title: A MARVELous Place
blog.description: Just mainly incorrect Marvel quotes, Marvel headcannons, art and such

summary:
The Iron-Family at Disneyland: Getting Ready and On their Way
Peter had been relentless. He had always wanted to go to Disney,...
body:
The Iron-Family at Disneyland: Getting Ready and On their Way

Peter had been relentless. He had always wanted to go to Disney, and so did Harley, Nebula and Vision. Tony and Pepper had taken Morgan there once, but she was too little to remember it.

“Ok, does everyone have their bags?” Tony said.

They all shook their heads yes. Peter had a Spiderman backpack he saw at Target, Harley had a red and black bag, Nebula had a silky blue bag, Vision had a normal backpack, and Tony held Morgans Iron Man backpack with a Hello Kitty key chain.

“Ok. Does everyone have sunscreen, money for food and stuff, and their phones, because we are not turning around.” Tony asked.

They all checked and said yes.

“Ok, let’s load up!” Tony motioned his hand towards the door. Peter and Harley took off running, while Nebula and Vision just walked. Tony said bye to Pepper and gave her a kiss, and Morgan hugged her. Morgan then went to run with Peter and Harley but Tony picked her up and carried her piggy-back style.

They all arrived at the car. Vision was in the front with Tony and helped navigate, Nebula and Morgan were in the next row, and Peter and Harley sat in the back.

The car was a war zone.

Peter dropped his phone and it slid up and infront of Nebula. Nebula had air pods from Tony on, and couldn’t hear Peter, and Morgan fell asleep.

“Oh no. She can’t hear us. She has air pods!” Harley joked, witch did not amuse Peter.

Peter webbed his mouth shut. He went to get unbuckled but Tony threatened to take away his suit if he did. Peter then asked Vision to get his phone, but he was too busy with helping Tony with directions.

Finally after about five minutes of bugging him, Vision unbuckled, got his phone and gave it to Peter. Meanwhile Tony took a wrong turn and was yelling at Vision, who blamed Peter. Harley got the webbing off with one of Nebula’s knives he found on the floor and was yelling at Peter. Morgan woke up and was grumpy, while Nebula still heard nothing.

About an hour later they arrived at the airport. Rhodey would come later and pick up Tony’s car.

After a long wait they boarded their plane. Harley was a little scared, so Tony sat beside him. Vision sat behind Tony with Morgan, and Peter and Nebula were infront of Tony and Harley.

The flight was much better than the car. Everyone fell asleep, except for Vision.

When the plane landed, Vision woke everyone up. Morgan wasn’t grumpy anymore, thank goodness for Tony.

They arrived at the park soon after. Tony had to explain to security about Nebula after she went through the metal detector. They were all allowed to go in.

Tony divided everyone into pairs. Harley and Peter, Nebula and Vision, and him and Morgan.

“Remember to check in at the Mad Tea Party at 1:00, and meet at the entrance at 6:00 to leave.” Tony reminded them.

They understood and took off.

“And stay safe!!” Tony yelled.

-

Hello there, and thank you for reading. My next chapter will probably be telling what Peter and Harley did. I’m not the best writer so I hope I did good! Don’t know when the next chapter will come out. Maybe tomorrow? I don’t know. Anyways, thank you 3000 for reading!
